infringement_analysis: formulation of capsules from bulk nizatidine
application_details: Apotex planned to make capsules from bulk nizatidine purchased from Novopharm under its licence
decision_reasoning: Unlicensed third-party purchasers do not inherit licensed rights solely by purchasing bulk material
result_of_case: The court prohibited the Minister from issuing a notice of compliance to Apotex until patents expire
cause_of_action: Eli Lilly sought to prevent Apotex from marketing nizatidine, alleging infringement due to Apotex's unlicensed activities
